content.value:
82Hostel is a guesthouse located in one of the most safe and fun areas of the city of Bogota - Colombia (Zona Rosa & Zona T), where you can find a variety of restaurants, bars, clubs and shopping.

We have 2 private rooms with private bathrooms, 3 private rooms with shared bathrooms and 4 Dorms with 6 and 8 beds.

We have a fully equipped kitchen, computer room, Wi-Fi, a TV room and 24 hours. Breakfast is included in the price of our rooms.

Our staff will give you the best welcoming service, so let us know how we can help you plan your stay! Some our goodies for you includes (free continental breakfast, fresh Colombian coffee and tea 24/7, free power WiFi and a fully equipped kitchen, computer room, TV room.

description.description: 82hostel represents all that Bogota has to offer. Itâ€™s a cool, modern and comfortable place to sleep if you want to enjoy the best of our beautiful capital City. We are located in the safest and cool areas of the city, where you can find many different things to do. (Bars, cafes, Restaurants, clubs, shopping and shoppings center).
